title: Teenager dies after early-morning shooting in Southeast Washington
text:
A teenager has died after a shooting early Tuesday in Southeast Washington, the D.C. police said.

They said Steffen Brathwaite, 16, of Southeast, was shot just after midnight in the 3000 block of 24th Place SE near Suitland Parkway in the Garfield Heights neighborhood.

Police said officers found him after hearing gunshots.

He was taken to a hospital, where he died.

No arrests have been reported, and no information about any motive was available.

description: The 16-year-old was found just after midnight in the Garfield Heights neighborhood.
